reviews.text: I needed a roof/gutter replacement. Custom Exterior showed up early and the group was awesome. They layed tarps to catch shingles and nails throughout the day. They left my yard cleaner than before they started! Finished the job fast and promptly. We are very happy with the communication and price! Would recommend!

My husband, Donavon, and I have had work done by them in previous years and have been very pleased.  A little slow at times but quality is excellent. Their workers (Juan) are very professional. We just had roofing, siding and kitchen remodel completed. Very satisfied with service provided. I would highly recommend them.
In January  2024, we had additional work done to wrap the soffits and windows of our home - excellent job, quick response time. Very pleased with quality of work.

they replaced our siding and repainted the exterior
they worked closely with our roofers to get the gables done right.  great friendly and knowledgeable crew. some extra needed repairs added at reasonable price. overall great value and quality
HHARPER pilot point tx

We had new windows put it 13 years ago and have been very pleased with them.  Recently we had several that would not stay up when raised.  Called them and they came and fixed all of them under warranty.  I highly recommend them for you window needs.

Best workmanship, and knowledgeable employees. Custom Exteriors completed my home more that 20 years ago. Ask them back for a carport conversion to garage. Had to special order the color as being older, but the match was great, looked as if the garage was always part of the house. In the process of selling and the real estate agent could not believe it was not part of the ordinal home. Great work thank you.

Was really, really wanting to do business with this company. They seem to be the only company in DFW that offers SEAMLESS steel siding. Talked to them on the phone. Over a period of four weeks, they kept assuring me again and again that they were coming out to do an estimate. I followed up multiple times - each time they said they would come out on such and such day and never did! Finally, I just gave up. So disappointed.  Anyway, I would up going with box steel siding for my house through a dif

They never showed up to give us a quote for siding on our house. We scheduled an appointment for them to do so and they failed to show up.  After I called to ask about making another appointment, they told me that they would have the owner call me back to schedule another appointment, and again, failed to follow through.  I was hopeful to use a local business for the exterior of our home but they forced me to look elsewhere.
Did us a great job at a good price
Great place with honest people. The work is fantastic.
Professional work!! Left work area clean!!

Thanks Ruth. If you need anything else please call  
Mike Strand 940-390-1243

I;m not sure who you are but we have not done any work for you.
is there something you need from us?
